item.name: cpuEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all cpu health status.

item.name: deviceName
item.description: The device name value between 1 to 63 characters.

item.name: deviceSerialNo
item.description: The device serial number value between 1 to 63 characters.

trigger.name: Server {HOST.NAME} No data for > 5 minutes
trigger.description: Abnormal BMC connection, please check the network interface of the network card

item.name: diskPartitionUsagethreshold
item.description: Percent of hard disk partition usage threshold.

item.name: ethMACAddress
item.description: Information about MAC address.

item.name: fanEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all fan health status.

item.name: hardDiskEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all hard disk health status.

item.name: hostName
item.description: The host name between 1 to 64 characters. Supported characters: 0-9 a-z A-Z - ('-' is not allowed to be the first/last character). Default value is xFusion.

item.name: memoryEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all memory health status.

item.name: PCIeDeviceEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all PCIe health status.

item.name: PCIeDeviceMaxNum
item.description: Maximum number of PCIe cards.

item.name: peakPower
item.description: System peak power, unit is W.

item.name: powerConsumption(kWh)
item.description: Power consume from power statistic start time, unit is kWh.

item.name: powerSupplyEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all power supply health status.

item.name: presentSystemPower
item.description: Display the present system power.

item.name: sysName
item.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

item.name: systemCpuUsage
item.description: Percent of CPU usage. The value defined as: -1: invalid current CPU usage. [0,100]: represents the current CPU usage.

item.name: systemHealth
item.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health. This value will be one of the following: (1-OK, 2-Minor, 3-Major, 4-Critical)

trigger.name: systemHealth Critical
trigger.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health. This value will be one of the following: (1-OK, 2-Minor, 3-Major, 4-Critical)

trigger.name: systemHealth major
trigger.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health. This value will be one of the following: (1-OK, 2-Minor, 3-Major, 4-Critical)

trigger.name: systemHealth minor
trigger.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health.

item.name: systemMemUsage
item.description: Percent of memory usage. The value defined as: -1: invalid current memory usage. [0,100]: represents the current memory usage.

item.name: Inlet Temperature(Â°C)
item.description: If power off, the CPU temperature cannot be readable and is set to 65535.

discovery_rule.name: businessPortLocation
discovery_rule.description: Information about businessport belongs to which netcard.

item_prototype.name: businessPort [{#SNMPINDEX}] Location
item_prototype.description: Information about businessport belongs to which netcard.

discovery_rule.name: businessPortOSLinkStatus
discovery_rule.description: Business port link status reported by OS. The status will be N/A if iBMA is not installed.

item_prototype.name: businessPort [{#SNMPINDEX}] OSLinkStatus
item_prototype.description: Business port link status reported by OS. The status will be N/A if iBMA is not installed.

discovery_rule.description: Information about business port silk number within a netcard.

item_prototype.name: businessPort {#SNMPVALUE} SilkNum
item_prototype.description: Information about business port silk number within a netcard.

discovery_rule.name: logicalDriveName
discovery_rule.description: Information about logical drive name.[X.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

item_prototype.description: Information about logical drive name,[x.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

discovery_rule.description: Information about logical drive RAID level.[x.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

item_prototype.description: Information about logical drive RAID level.[x.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

discovery_rule.description: Information about logical drive size,[x.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

item_prototype.name: logicalDrive {#SNMPINDEX} Size(MB)
item_prototype.description: Information about logical drive size (MB).[x.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

discovery_rule.name: logicalDriveState
discovery_rule.description: Information about logical drive state,[X.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

item_prototype.name: logicalDrive {#SNMPINDEX} State
item_prototype.description: Information about logical drive state,[X.y]X represents the number of the raid card, y represents the number of the logical drive, such as 0, 1, 2

discovery_rule.name: memoryClockRate
discovery_rule.description: Information about memory clock rate.The units MHz.

item_prototype.description: Information about memory clock rate.The units MHz.

item_prototype.name: raidController {#SNMPVALUE} FwVersion
item_prototype.description: Information about RAID controller firmware version.

mapping.newvalue: Ready to perform predictive spare rebuild
memory correctable error and memory uncorrectable error
memory ECC error reached limit and memory correctable error
